entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@IvankaTrump President Trump suggests "injection" of disinfectant to beat coronavirus and "clean" the lungs at the White House daily briefing. 

A Dept. of Homeland Security official later said federal laboratories are not considering such a treatment option.
